titles.title: Cruise Missile Proliferation bill

Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2264) making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and related agencies, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1998, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-214, by Mr. Dreier.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2264 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by paragraph. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 74.

bill.summary: 7/28/1997--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2264 (Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and related agencies appropriations).
